description:
Update: July 2020. This creek was overrun by the Eagle Creek wildfire in Sept 2017. The area has been reopened, but please use extreme caution when descending the creek. Between landslides, fallen trees, and loose rocks, this area may be very unstable and dangerous for years to come. The canyon may have changed dramatically.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

Creek was first descended by Keith Campbell and Karl Helser in May 2015.
name: Devil's Whisper
